com.qtfx.lib.mkt.chart

Class ChartHorizontalAxis

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.qtfx.lib.mkt.chart.ChartHorizontalAxis

  • public class ChartHorizontalAxis
extends java.lang.Object
    An horizontal axis in a chart view. The horizontal axis contains one or two lines and shows time information depending on the period shown.
    Author:
    Miquel Sas

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      (package private) static class  ChartHorizontalAxis.TimePeriod
      An enumeration of the time periods to show with their approximate millis.

        year - Year flag
        month - Month flag.
        day - Day flag.
        hour - Hour flag.
        minute - Minute flag.
        second - Second flag.
        millis - Millis flag.
        separators - Separators flag.

      • isStartTimePeriod

        private boolean isStartTimePeriod(long timeCurrent,
                                  long timePrevious,
                                  ChartHorizontalAxis.TimePeriod timePeriod)
        Check if the given time is the start time of the time period.
        Parameters:
        timeCurrent - The current time to check.
        timePrevious - The previous time to check.
        timePeriod - The reference time period.
        Returns:
        A boolean that indicates if the given time is the start time of the time period.

        Returns the time period to plot that fits in the available width.
        Parameters:

        timeElapsed - The total time elapsed.
